sentences.sContent: Being early breeds serendipity. Really. When you are early for things, even meetings and appointments, magical things tend to happen. That is when chance happens.
sentences.sContent_eng: Being early breeds serendipity. Really. When you are early for things, even meetings and appointments, magical things tend to happen. That is when chance happens.
sentences.sCn: 早一步就蕴藏着意外的运气。这是真的。当你凡事抢占先机，哪怕是开会和面谈，神奇的事情就可能发生。机会就是这样来的。

trans.tranCn: 意外发现珍奇  事物的本领
